item.title: 1.0.1-beta.8
item.description:
1.0.1-beta.8: New Display Options, Performance Fixes & Refined Logic

New Features:

  • Display Flexibility:
    • Added a new option to use the Thaw Bar only on notched displays, allowing for a more tailored experience on modern Mac hardware.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Performance & Efficiency:
    • Reduced background activity by skipping expensive timer work when panels are not currently visible.
    • Refactored the rehide logic to remove the temporary item delay setting, as the smart rehide system now more efficiently handles user activity and open menus.
  • Localization Updates:
    • Updated Traditional Chinese (zh-Hant) localizations..
    • Updated German localizations.

item.title: 1.0.1-beta.7
item.description:
1.0.1-beta.7: Performance, Refined Interaction & Improved Caching

New Features:

  • Enhanced Menu Bar Interaction:
    • Added double-click support for the "Always-Hidden" section when in "Show on click" mode.
    • Added SF Symbol icons to all context menus, including the status item and menu bar right-click menus.
    • Implemented a system-disabled icon warning that notifies users when section dividers are hidden by macOS system settings.
  • Improved Performance & Startup:
    • Added a disk cache for images to enable faster app restarts.
    • Optimized the image cache to debounce and cancel redundant updates, significantly reducing background processing.
    • Refactored move logic to remove unnecessary "nudges" and simplified targeting by using item centers.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • Multi-Monitor & Layout Stability:
    • Improved app menu hiding logic to better account for screen notches and space constraints across multiple monitors.
    • Fixed a race condition during layout resets by ensuring background tasks complete before refreshing the cache.
  • UI & Interaction Refinements:
    • Replaced SwiftUI shadows with native NSPanel shadows to eliminate ghosting artifacts when the Ice Bar is hidden.
    • Added a 500ms grace period to prevent the Ice Bar from flickering immediately after being shown.
    • The search panel now automatically closes when it loses focus.
  • Localization Updates:
    • German and French translations are now 100% complete.
    • Added and updated Indonesian and Traditional Chinese translations.
    • Updated Spanish localization.

item.title: 1.0.1-beta.6
item.description:
1.0.1-beta.6: Stability, Multi-Monitor & Localization

⚠️ Important Note: Due to essential internal changes in how Thaw manages menu bar items, your current icon positions will be reset to "Always Visible." I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience, but this manual re-adjustment is unavoidable to ensure future stability.

New Features:

  • Expanded Localization:
    • Added Simplified Chinese (zh-Hans) translation.
    • Added Traditional Chinese translation.
    • French localization is now 100% complete.
    • Improved translatability for various labels.
  • Enhanced Diagnostics: High-priority system messages are now written to both the console and diagnostic log files to assist with troubleshooting.

Improvements & Fixes:

  • System Reliability & Self-Healing:
    • Implemented a health check and recovery system for HID events and event taps. The app now automatically detects and resets if system monitors become stuck or invalidated.
    • Added a 5-second timeout to internal semaphores to prevent the app from permanently disabling input if a task is delayed or lost.
  • Menu Bar & Multi-Monitor Logic:
    • Hot Corner Protection: Adjusted synthesized drag events to stay 5 pixels from the top of the screen, preventing accidental activation of macOS Hot Corners.
    • Active Screen Targeting: On multi-monitor setups, the hidden section and Ice Bar now only appear on the monitor with the active menu bar.
    • Position Verification: Added a polling loop and post-move verification to ensure items actually reach their destination before interaction.
    • Improved rehide detection for apps with non-standard popup windows using a 2-second grace interval and window scanning.
  • Ice Bar & Layout Stability:
    • Icon Scaling: Icons in the Ice Bar now scale to fill the available height, preventing them from appearing too small on large displays like the 16" MacBook Pro.
    • Show Desktop Fix: The Ice Bar now remains stationary and visible during "Show Desktop" gestures.
    • Layout Refresh: The layout pane now correctly refreshes new items even if the Settings window was already open.
    • Persistence: Added logic to automatically relocate items back to their original sections if an app quits or relaunches unexpectedly.
  • Image Cache:
    • Reduced the blacklist cooldown from 5 minutes to 30 seconds for faster recovery of transient items.
    • Cached images are now preserved for items with recent capture failures to prevent empty icons.
    • Added deduplication to prevent duplicate window reports during move operations.

1.0.0: The Official Release

Thaw has reached its first stable milestone! This release consolidates all the progress from the beta period into a polished, reliable menu bar manager.

Latest Improvements (since beta 4):

  • Enhanced Reliability: Stabilized HIDEventManager logic to prevent "show on hover" and "show on click" from stopping after repeated use and prevent saving chevron divider position which could leave Thaw in an unusable state.
  • UI Polish: Condensed the menu bar tooltip for a cleaner look and added explicit double-click instructions.
  • System Safety: Improved thread safety by synchronizing access to the cursor hide count.
  • Apple Menu Fix: Refined synthetic press offsets to ensure Thaw never accidentally triggers the Apple menu.

Highlights from the Journey to 1.0:

  • The Big Thaw: Successfully forked and rebranded with a new identity, app icon, and independent bundle ID (com.stonerl.Thaw).
  • Ice Migration: Built-in support to import your old settings and control item positions from Ice.
  • Advanced Control: Introduced "Double-Click to Reveal" for always-hidden items and "Smart Rehide" strategies.
  • Modern macOS Support: Optimized for stability on macOS 26.
  • Performance: Faster icon caching, display-aware state refreshing, and thread-safe operations.

Known Issues:

If you are currently on macOS 14 or 15, please be aware that Thaw currently has some known bugs regarding temporary icons in the floating Thaw bar.

I am actively investigating these issues and will release a fix as soon as possible. You can track the progress of this issue here: GitHub Issue #1.

Thank you for all the feedback during the beta period that made this release possible!
